## isNumber() function

检查值value是否为number类型

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isNumber(value: unknown): value is number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | unknown | 要检查的值 |

**Returns:**

value is number

如果value等于Number类型,那么返回true,否则返回false
